name: The King's Treasure
description:
Long time has passed since the Old King died under mysterious circumstances. Rumors about its huge treasure flow among the whole Kingdom. You are an adventurer who just arrived to the Old King's castle, now filled with monsters, seeking to recover such legendary treasure. Will you prevail and find the King's treasure?

Controls:

- Everything*: Arrow Keys

*This is a submission for the Indie Dev Jam en Español #4, where the theme is "only moving". Thus, you can only move to do everything: attack monsters, pick up items and hearts, interact with the environment and, of course, move.
